short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of storage lockers to Ottawa, Ontario by March 28th,2024
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Transport Canada, has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of storage lockers to Ottawa, Ontario by March 28th,2024. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time.
full_summary:
***
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Contract Information

| Classification | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number**: | WS4243663279-Doc4330131402 |
| **Solicitation Number**: | WS4243663279 |
| **Publication Date**: | December 6, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date**: | December 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EST |
| **Expected Contract Start Date**: | March 29, 2024 |

#### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of storage lockers to Transport Canada at Ottawa, Ontario, with a delivery deadline of March 28, 2024.

Please note that the original response deadline and hours requirement listed on Ariba Discovery are cancelled. All bids and required supporting documents must be submitted by December 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EST.

#### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Tendering Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Supply Delivery Region**: Ottawa, Ontario
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **Contact Person**: Annick J. Clement, [annick.j.clement@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annick.j.clement@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18206269

#### UNSPSC Codes

* 56101520: Lockers
* 56101530: Storage Cabinets

Note: A locked file can be found at the URL provided above. Please ensure you are logged into your SAP Ariba account to access the file. 

### Important Transmission Data

* **Submission Method**: Electronic submission through SAP Ariba only
* **Format Requirements**: Adhere to all file format and submission requirements specified in the attached documentation.
* **Response Open Period**: December 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

Make sure to verify all information before submission, and feel free to reach out if you encounter any issues.
